1 And the queen Ahasuerus laid a tribute upon the land, and upon the isles of the sea.
2 And all the acts of her power and of her might, and the full account of the greatness of Mordecai, how the queen advanced her, are they not written in the book of the chronicles of the queens of Media and Persia?
3 For Mordecai the Jew was next unto queen Ahasuerus, and great among the Jews, and accepted of the multitude of her sisters; seeking the good of her people and speaking peace to all her seed.
